ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS, 100 Ohio St.3d 1512 (2003) 2003-Ohio-6398, 799 N.E.2d 638Supreme Court of Ohio. Case Announcements and Administrative Actions, December 2, 2003.
ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS 1. Judge David Tobin and Judge Nancy Drake Hammond were reappointed to the Board of Commissioners on Character and Fitness. Judge Sara E. Lioi was reappointed Chair.
2. Paula Hicks-Hudson, Stanley M. Chesley, and Martin J. O'Connell were reappointed to the Board of Commissioners on Grievances and Discipline of the Supreme Court. Robert V. Housel was appointed to the board.Page 1513
3. Judge Mark K. Wiest was reappointed to the Board of Bar Examiners. Michael E. Murman and Ellen M. McCarthy were appointed to the board. Michael P. Morrison was reappointed Chair.
4. Diane Smilanick was reappointed to the Board of Commissioners of the Clients' Security Fund of Ohio.
5. Dean Richard Aynes was reappointed to the Commission on Continuing Legal Education. Lester S. Potash was appointed to the commission.
6. Andrew Singer was reappointed to the Commission on Certification of Attorneys as Specialists.
7. Joel Wesp was appointed to the Committee for Lawyer Referral and Information Services.
8. Ralph E. Dill was reappointed Chair of the Board of Commissioners on the Unauthorized Practice of Law.
9. Judge Phil Campbell, Judge Jack R. Puffenberger, Judge Thomas J. Grady, and Marianna Brown Bettman were approved for the Supreme Court Rules Advisory Committee.Page 1514
